import React, { useState } from 'react' import Menu from './Menu'; const Galrey = () => { const [data,setdata]=useState(Menu) return ( <>

Order your favourit Dish

{ data.map((ele)=>{ const {id, name,image,description, price}=ele; return( <>

{name}

{description}

Price: {price}

*Price may vary on selected date.

) }) }
) } export default Galrey;
